document.full_text: a computer security researcher has found a flaw in microsoft corp's widely used internet explorer browser that he said could let hackers steal credentials to access facebook, twitter and other websites.
document.title: microsoft latest security risk: "cookiejacking"
lines_and_colors: a computer security researcher has found a flaw in microsoft corp's widely used internet explorer browser that he said could let hackers steal credentials to access facebook, twitter and other websites.
